name: Real Estate Website
detail: This is the front-end portion of an ongoing MERN stack real estate project. Deployed version of this project focus on design & animations.Functionality is still under development

name: Dice Game
detail: Exciting React project where user can roll the dice and get a point if the dice value matches with the previously selected number. Created this simple yet engaging dice game using React, enhancing my skills in front-end development, state management, and user interface design.

name: Book Store
detail: The main focus of this project  is on core aspects of the MERN stack such as Building backend CURD operations | Setting up routing | Handling CORS policies | Performing MongoDB operations | Implementing frontend CURD & routing

name: Real Estate Website - Ongoing
detail: A feature-rich  real estate website using the MERN stack. Currently working in the integration phase where both front-end & back-end components are significantly being developed. User Authentication & Authorization | Property listing | Favorites & Booking

name: Contact Us - Practice Project
detail: primary aim of gaining practical experience and improving my React skills. The project serves as a simple landing page. Used this project as an educational tool to deepen understanding of React concepts, component composition, github & deployment
